long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The CRUD Chrome Extension allows users to efficiently manage items with create, read, update, and delete functionalities. This user-friendly tool integrates seamlessly with Chrome, enabling item storage and retrieval using Chrome's local storage. With an intuitive interface and clean design, users can easily add, edit, and delete items, ensuring their list is always up to date. Perfect for organizing tasks, notes, or any list-based information, this extension enhances productivity directly within the browser.
